Reading.name: Reading
Reading.desc: I like reading classic literature. Sure, sometimes classic books seem boring, but there are universal gems like 'Crime and Punishment'. An in-depth psychological study of a human soul by Fyodor Dostoevsky. A story about a person who tried to become great by committing a sin but could not bear the emotional torture that came with it.

Anime.name: Anime
Anime.desc: I like good stories. I find that lately Western media have been lacking them, so Anime is now my go-to source of inspiration. I am that Anime fan that would not watch all 500 episodes of Naruto and instead will go to wiki, read summary and watch only those episodes that seem interesting. My all-time favourite is 'The Basketball that Kuroko plays'.

Badminton.name: Badminton
Badminton.desc: I really like playing badminton. I am not a professional. But it was never windy in the city I grew up in, so badminton was a perfect thing to do. Join me, I would be happy to play with you!
